# CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge

**Enumeration**

An object that represents a single edge of a surface.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Edge
```

## Overview

Each [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface] instance in a captured room’s surface arrays ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/doors], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/openings], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/walls], and [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/windows]) has a set ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface/completedEdges]) that contains one of each case in this enumeration.

## Accessing edge types

- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.top**: An edge that identifies the top of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.bottom**: An edge that identifies the bottom of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.left**: An edge that identifies the left side of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge.right**: An edge that identifies the right side of a surface.

## Shaping a surface

- **completedEdges**: An array of edges that outline the surface.
- **curve**: An object that represents the curve of a surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Curve**: An object that represents a single curve of a surface.
- **polygonCorners**: A 2D polygon that represents nonuniform wall heights and floor shapes.

## Conforms To

- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
